title: Snow Cloud
summaries: Snow Cloud is a type of block that can be crafted at a Sky Mill from Cloud blocks in the Snow biome. Snow Cloud blocks cause purely decorative snowflakes to appear beneath them, continuing for about 8 tiles and then fading away for 5 more. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, landing on Snow Clouds will not inflict fall damage.
In drunk worlds, Snow Clouds are generated naturally as part of snow-themed Floating Islands.
